snippet: The deal envisions completion by 2015 and would require the canal and the consortium to each inject $100 million.
abstract: Panama Canal Authority says it expects to sign deal to finish work on expanding waterway and end dispute over cost overruns that have held up project; deal envisions completion by 2015 and would require canal and consortium to each inject $100 million.
lead_paragraph: The deal envisions completion by 2015 and would require the canal and the consortium to each inject $100 million.

headline.main: Deal Near to Resume Panama Canal Expansion
headline.print_headline: Deal Near to Resume Panama Canal Expansion
